content.rendered:
Site information

  • The funding of the site is a personal investment
  • This website promotes the services offered at the Medical Office of Prof. Federico Guercini, M.D. It does not contain third party advertising.
    The information provided is designed to support, not replace,the relationship that exists between a patient/site visitor and his/her physician.
  • The Author of the content of site is Federico Guercini MD
  • This site does not collect any personal nor confidential data. Any Information sent through this website is not saved nor shared with any third party.

—

Date of last modification: December 31st 2015
